messages.en: Taken out!
Big Bob, are you okay--
Huh, that injury on your leg.

messages.zh: 那里有漏网的！可能是瓦各斯克团的人！
messages.en: There's a leak! Could be Gdańsk people.

messages.zh: 这个我自己能处理！先击退敌人！
messages.en: I can handle this myself! Defeat the enemy first!
Alright.
Huh?
This little guy...
Hey, hey, what’s with that look in your eye?

messages.zh: 别，别过来，不怕我在你身上开个窟窿吗！
messages.en: Don't! Don't come any closer! Do you want me to blow a hole in you!
What?
Have you taken care of them?
Yeah.

messages.zh: 真厉害。这么小的个子，本事倒是不小。
messages.en: Pretty good. Not bad for someone your size.

messages.zh: 坐在那里别动。我来给你包扎。
messages.en: Sit still. Let me dress you up.
It's not a problem. Let me get up.
No.
So you seen it.
Yes.

messages.zh: 你看到我身上的结晶了吧？你难道想被感染吗？！
messages.en: You see the crystals on me? Do you want to get infected as well?!

messages.zh: 感染者，本来就是我们罗德岛的救助对象。
messages.en: Infected people are always the target of help for Rhode Island.
Rhode Island...

messages.zh: 罗德岛是......？不是维多利亚......？
messages.en: Rhode Island...? I thought you were Victoria...?

messages.zh: 以前是维多利亚的骑警，不过现在，是罗德岛的干员。
messages.en: Used to be Victoria mounted police, but now I work for Rhode Island.

messages.zh: 离我远一点，小姑娘。我是感染者。
messages.en: Stay away from me, young lady. I'm infected.

messages.zh: 可萝尔小姐，这可能有点血腥，你稍稍回避下吧？
messages.en: Miss Carol, this might get a little gory. Can you excuse yourself for a little while?
Okay, the bleeding has stopped.

messages.zh: 你经常这么做吗，给感染者？
messages.en: Do you do this frequently... for infected people?
Aren’t you scare of...

messages.zh: 我的同事有很多都感染了矿石病，但我分不出究竟有谁感染了。
messages.en: Many of my colleagues are infected with the disease, but I can't tell who has it.
Huh?

messages.zh: 也就洗澡的时候能看得出来吧？
messages.en: It's only obvious when they take a shower?
Hmm...

messages.zh: 多谢你了，没戒心的小个子。
messages.en: Thank you very much. Trustful girl.
